aboutPara1: Martin Griffin is an acclaimed author of thrillers whose work has been translated into multiple languages. He lives in Manchester, UK, with his wife and daughter.
aboutPara2: The Second Stranger (2023) was followed by The Last Visitor (2024). His third novel, Burning Season, will be published in November 2026.
aboutPara3: He is currently working on his fourth.
